relation: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Campus police are willing to help.
Teachers and staff are willing to help. Just ask.
Ask questions if you don't understand what is being taught. Stay on top of what is due. Get Involved.
I loved being at Amarillo College. All of my teachers and advisers were behind me all the way. Amarillo College is a great school.
pageTitle: Amarillo College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {190004=I am currently enrolled in my 2nd semester at AC. I graduated high school in 2003, so last semester was a bit rough. They have a great website as well as advisors on campus to help answer questions., 169088=There isn't really Dorm Life per say at Amarillo College, but there are plenty of housing opportunities in the area surrounding the school. May not be right around the corner, but the opportunity is still there., 192503=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Great for these types of students Any type of student A.C. has something for everyone Bang for the buck Great classes with a great tuition price What to do for fun Clubs Food and Dining There are several fundraiser's a month with great food Dorm Life There are no dorms here Academic Rigor Five star school Tips for prospective students Do your best to not miss class. Develope good study habits and become active in the clubs A.C has. In three sentences The best school for my educational needs. understanding proffessors who lecture with complete accuacy. A great school involved in community activities. Login to rate or flag the reviews Chantz from Amarillo, TX 07/16/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 of 49
